    Scott (1981)

    scott_1981.Rd

    Allometric models from Scott (1981)

    Stem Volume Models

    vsa = b_0 + b_1 * dsob^b_2 + b_3 * dsob^(b_4) * hsm^b_5

    • vsa [ft3] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hsm [ft] - merchantable height of the stem

    Model Parameters

    vsa = b_0 + b_1 * dsob^b_2 + b_3 * dsob^(b_4) * hsm^b_5

    • vsa [ft3] - volume of the entire stem, including top and stump

    • dsob [in] - diameter of the stem, outside bark at breast height

    • hsm [ft] - merchantable height of the stem
